snippet: The United States expanded sanctions targeting North Korea, imposing economic penalties on six of its international banking representatives and three of its shipping companies.
abstract: United States imposes economic penalties on six of North Korea's banking representatives and three of its shipping companies for having ties to illicit arm proliferation and financing.
lead_paragraph: The United States expanded sanctions targeting North Korea, imposing economic penalties on six of its international banking representatives and three of its shipping companies.

headline.print_headline: Asia; North Korea: U.S. Adds Penalties

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Office of Foreign Assets Control (United States Treasury)
